name: L.A.F inc.
description:
L.A.F inc.

The Lost and Found inc. will help anyone in space find their lost object! Get in your space ship and  seek out anyone in need using your grappling hook. Can you help return the three lost items?

Make sure not to crash into any planets!

How to play

  • Space bar: accelerate
  • Right click: grab a planet to turn
  • Look at the last screenshot for a map!

Made using our own custom engine.

Made during the Global Game Jam 2021.

Best played in Chrome
